content: slater page 3 chart b all ws row as row 2 k3 p until 2sts before end k2 section 3 next row rs as row 17 of section 2 until 2sts before end place sm k1 kfb next row ws k3 sl sm p until 2sts before end k2 60sts knit according to written or chart instructions for chart c read chart from right to left the chart only shows rs row up to the stitch marker all ws row are as row 2 below work pattern row 1 to 4 until the work measures 128cm along the straight right-hand edge rs from the cast on stitches ending on row 4 chart c written instructions row 1 rs k3 *k2tog k2 yo k1 yo k2 ssk repeat from * until sm sl sm k until 1st before end kfb row 2 ws k3 p to sm sl sm p until 2sts before end k2 row 3 k2 *k2tog k2 yo k1 yo k2 ssk repeat from * until 1st before sm k1 sl sm k until 1st before end kfb row 4 as row 2 hilbre © 2020 gill slater page 4 chart c all ws row as row 2 k3 p to sm sl sm p until 2sts before end k2 border section row 1 rs *k5 p4 repeat from * until 3sts before sm k3 sl sm *p2 k2 repeat from * as far as possible until 2sts before end k1 kfb row 2 ws k3 p to sm sl sm p until 2sts before end k2 repeat row 1 and 2 until the border section measures 10cm you can make the border as long or as short as you prefer or just keep going until you ve used up all your yarn to finish cast off weave in any loose ends this shawl would benefit from wet blocking from the designer thank you for downloading this pattern if you do have any questions or suggestions then please get in touch you can find me as gillywizz on ravelry and @designanddoodles on instagram please respect my copyright this pattern is for personal use hoinlblyre © 2020 gill slater page 5
